T02D3499:151a-1: a'arya dz'am gu l'i t'a r'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3499:151a-3: 'phags ma sgrol ma dug sel ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3499:151a-4: sgrol ma dug sel ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3499:151a-5: dz'am gu l'i yi gzugs 'dzin pa'i //
T02D3499:151a-6: bcom ldan sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal //
T02D3499:151b-0: @151b sems can kun la brtse ba'i phyir //
T02D3499:151b-1: de yi sgrub thabs mchog gyur bri //
T02D3499:151b-2: dang por re zhig sngags pas gtsang zhing khrus byas nas phreng ba dang gos dkar po bgos te /
T02D3499:151b-3: skye bos dben pa'i sa phyogs su byug pa byas
T02D3499:151b-4: la dri bzangs dkar pos chag chab btab nas me
T02D3499:151b-5: tog dkar po gcal du bkram ste ;
T02D3499:151b-6: stan bde ba la 'dug nas 'gro ba rnams la byams pa dang snying rje bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3499:151b-7: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D3499:151b-8: de nas stong pa nyid mngon du bya zhing bsams
T02D3499:151b-9: nas pam yig dkar po las skyes pa'i padma dkar
T02D3499:151b-11: de'i steng du aam yig las skyes pa'i zla ba'i
T02D3499:151b-12: dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hr'i: yig dkar po 'od
T02D3499:151b-13: zer gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa 'phro ba'o //
T02D3499:151b-14: de las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma dug sel ma bsgom par bya ste /
T02D3499:151b-15: sku mdog dkar mo phyag bzhi pa /
T02D3499:151b-17: na bza' dkar po'i stod g-yogs can /
T02D3499:151b-18: rin po che dkar po'i rgyan dang ldan ma sbrul dkar pos brgyan pa /
T02D3499:151b-19: sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa //
T02D3499:151b-20: rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis pi wang bsgreng ba /
T02D3499:151b-21: gnyis pa'i g-yas dang g-yon pas sbrul dkar po dang /
T02D3499:151b-22: mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya mdzad pa /
T02D3499:151b-23: zla ba'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba can bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3499:151b-24: spyi bo dang mgrin pa dang nu ma'i bar du
T02D3499:151b-25: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i a'a:hr'i: h'um gi
T02D3499:151b-26: yi ge la sogs pa ji srid mi ngal gyi
T02D3499:151b-28: de nas sngags bzlas par bya ste /
T02D3499:151b-29: hr'i:yig 'bum phrag bdun bzlas nas me tog dkar pos sbyin sreg khri phrag bdun bya'o //
T02D3499:151b-30: mkhas pas rgyan thams cad dkar po gdags par bya'o //
T02D3499:151b-31: de nas bya khyung gi dbang phyug gi mthus bstan
T02D3499:151b-32: bcos thams cad la mi 'jigs pa'i mkhas par 'gyur
